mapper.insert:
insert into final_history_sequence
sequence_id,
sequence_redis_uuid,
create_time,
#{sequenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sequenceRedisUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update final_history_sequence
sequence_id = #{sequenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sequence_redis_uuid = #{sequenceRedisUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sequence_redis_uuid from final_history_sequence where sequence_id=#{sequenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time desc

select sequence_id,sequence_owner_id,sequence_redis_uuid from final_history_sequence,final_sequence where final_history_sequence.create_time < #{maxCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and final_history_sequence.sequence_id=final_sequence.id
